successes.title: Glow: The First Smart Headphones with Laser Light
successes.description: Using lasers, dual balanced armature drivers, and smartphone integration, Glow is the ultimate pairing of expression, sound and utility

Pledges.description:
THE DIGITAL HUG
It’s like getting a hug from the entire development team, except in the form of an unlocked Android live wallpaper app that pulses to the music being played.  You’ll also be immortalized in a wall of thanks on our website and in our app for being a supporter of Glow.

THE GLOW GOODIE BAG
Who doesn’t like a bag full of cool gifts?
Digital Hug tier + Special Edition Virtual Reality Viewer + Glow Music VR App + Glow Canvas Tote Bag.

Special Edition Cardboard (VR) & interactive app.  You receive a specially designed Dodocase Virtual Reality Cardboard Kit + an unlocked version of our VR app.  Enjoy the latest new virtual worlds.  Play immersive games or even watch music concerts in 3D.

THE EARLY BIRD SPECIAL
Let’s get the party started!  Be one of the first supporters to pledge $127 on 1/27 and get your own pair of Glow headphones in red, green, or blue. Whoa, and 127 is a prime number, just as Glow is a prime pair of headphones!

THE KICKSTARTER SPECIAL
Make the pledge and be one of the first to get Glow in your choice of red, green, or blue!  This special pricing is being offered only to Kickstarter supporters.

DOUBLE THE GLOW
Good things come in pairs, and Glow is no exception.  Save by doubling down on the pledge and get two Glow headphones in your choice of colors.

TRIPLE THE GLOW
Get three Glow headphones in this combo pack. Get three of your favorite color, two of your favorite and one to switch it up, or one of each color if you can't decide (it's hard, they're all pretty awesome).  This is a reduced price for colorful Kickstarter supporters.

4X THE GLOW
Get four (4) Glow headphones in this combo pack. Share the Glow with the people you care about most! This is a reduced price for colorful Kickstarter supporters.

THE DEVELOPER'S KIT
Excited about making your app Glow? Get early access to our prototype hardware and SDK in April. Our SDK will enable your app to control the glowing and to receive key events from the controller. The early prototype hardware is the same hardware as our team is using for developing our own Glow apps and SDK. Also, as a special thanks for helping our entire ecosystem glow, you will receive a final consumer release version of Glow (red, green, or blue) once we start shipping.
